doc.course_name: Excel Skills for Business: Intermediate II
doc.course_tag: Lookup Table//Microsoft Excel Vba//Data Validation//Microsoft Excel Macro
doc.course_chapter: Data Validation//Conditional Logic//Automating Lookups//Formula Auditing and Protection//Data Modelling//Recording Macros//Final Assessment
doc.course_sub_chapter: [['Week 1 Introduction', 'Week 1 Discussion', 'Practice Video: Data Validation', 'Practice Video: Creating Drop-down Lists', 'Practice Video: Using Formulas in Data Validation', 'Practice Video: Working with Data Validation', 'Practice Video: Advanced Conditional Formatting', 'Week 1 Wrap-Up'], ['Week 2 Introduction', 'Week 2 Discussion', 'Practice Video: Logical Functions I: IF', 'Practice Video: Logical Functions II: AND, OR', 'Practice Video: Combining Logical Functions I: IF, AND, OR', 'Practice Video: Combining Logical Functions II: Nested IFs', 'Practice Video: Handling Errors: IFERROR, IFNA', 'Week 2 Wrap-Up'], ['Week 3 Introduction', 'Week 3 Discussion', 'Practice Video: Introduction to Lookups: CHOOSE', 'Practice Video: Approximate Matches: Range VLOOKUP', 'Practice Video: Exact Matches: Exact Match VLOOKUP', 'Practice Video: Finding a Position: MATCH', 'Practice Video: Dynamic Lookups: INDEX, MATCH', 'Week 3 Wrap-Up'], ['Week 4 Introduction', 'Week 4 Discussion', 'Practice Video: Error Checking', 'Practice Video: Formula Calculation Options', 'Practice Video: Trace Precedents and Dependents', 'Practice Video: Evaluate Formula, Watch Window', 'Practice Video: Protecting Workbooks and Worksheets', 'Week 4 Wrap-Up'], ['Week 5 Introduction', 'Week 5 Discussion', 'Practice Video: Modelling Functions: SUMPRODUCT', 'Practice Video: Data Tables', 'Practice Video: Goal Seek', 'Practice Video: Scenario Manager', 'Practice Video: Solver', 'Week 5 Wrap-Up'], ['Week 6 Introduction', 'Week 6 Discussion', 'Practice Video: Record a Macro', 'Practice Video: Run a Macro', 'Practice Video: Edit a Macro', 'Practice Video: Working with Macros', 'Practice Video: Relative Reference Macros', 'Week 6 Wrap-Up'], ['Final Assessment']]
doc.reviews: ['Prashan for President!!!', 'In my opinion it is a mandatory course for everyone', 'Challenging, but well worth the effort. I learned a lot about what-if analyses and error checking that will be very helpful. The instruction on macros could be more detailed to include how to use macros with lists in data validation and how to edit.', 'Extremely useful for Accounting graduates. ', 'Course is fantastic, but the quizzes and challenges many times bring examples that have not been explained thoroughly. on the videos, it is given a simple example and then when it goes to quizzes and challenges, it brings a question that is way out of the depth of what has been explained.', ' Great course, the way they teach is easy to digest and very well structured. A++++ ', ' A rewarding experience because I have been able to learn very valuable information. It is an excellent course. It has helped me in the personal and professional field. Thank you. ', 'Hard course for sure, but It worth all the efforts', 'This course gives us a deep insight to many beautiful tools and features about excel which we never usually see. It greatly has increased my efficiency & makes me feel more professional!', 'A bit harder than Intermediate I, but still achievable. Thanks. ', 'A brilliantly designed course. Teaches you a lot and keeps you engaged.', 'A course rich in great content.', "Really helped me in clearing basics of Macro. Need to learn more about Macro's", 'very helpful course.', 'Very Very excelllent Course as its previous courses.', 'Absolutely brilliant. ', 'Learn this course material to validate and automate excel work.', 'Not an overly difficult course but sufficiently challenging to improve my Excel skills. Excellent instructors for the course.', 'Everything is broken down into reasonable chunks so that you are not overwhelmed. Instructors also provide excellent examples to walk through each concept.', 'Great course. You learn things that you do not know that exists but are so useful when you know them, it is great course 100% recommended.', 'It was awesome experience', 'Really insightful!! Thank you Coursera and Macquarie Uni', 'Best way to learn ecxel', 'Excellent quality. Builds on the skills learned in Essentials and Intermediate I and follows the same format. There is a jump in difficulty from Intermediate I, but the content of the class makes it manageable. I learned quite a bit in this course despite thinking of myself as a high-intermediate to low-advanced Excel user prior to taking this specialization. I highly recommend to anyone who took the prior two courses.', 'After taking Intermediate 1, I felt really confident that I could do a good Excel, but after Intermediate 2, now I felt sure of any task or Excel workbok I was passed, I could take it, improve it and automatize it for better efficiency.']
doc.reviewers: ['By Guido N', 'By Oleksandr L', 'By Casey N', 'By Lee C C', 'By Gisele', 'By Hayley B', 'By Carlos J B A', 'By Basel A Q', 'By Rushabh D D', 'By Xu C', 'By Sajag M', 'By Sushant K', 'By Muhammad F K', 'By LALIT K A', 'By Ayesha F', 'By Nathan H', 'By Ashish C', 'By Bernie K', 'By Jason Y', 'By Marlon A Z Z', 'By Harris A', 'By Utsav P', 'By Irma A H A', 'By Paul J B', 'By Sebastian T R']
